__TOC__

This task can be completed by anyone, and the more it's done the healthier the images will be.
Please communicate any build issues (provided you've followed correct procedures & aren't merely looking for technical assistance) to the Ubuntu Studio Developers mailing list: https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-studio-devel

=== Alpha Builds ===
For Alpha builds, do your downloads and reporting at: http://iso.qa.ubuntu.com/qatracker/build/ubuntustudio/all 

==== Daily Builds ====
For Daily builds, please download from: http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/ubuntustudio/daily/current/
and do all failure reports on the Ubuntu Studio Developers mailing list or in #ubuntustudio-devel IRC chat on the freenode network.
